backend/main.mo: Main actor canister implementing user profiles, artist profiles, artworks, submissions, inquiries, and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new format by adding a nullable avatar field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing avatar‑related profile updates and linking affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files across layout, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining the app’s light/dark color system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry defining TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global layout with ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Admin tab listing purchase inquiries with artwork preview, buyer info, message, and date.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays all artwork submissions for admins with actions to approve or reject and includes image preview via lightbox.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Provides a form for artists to create a profile with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form for editing artwork details, updating images, and handling authorization and validation errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate prompts or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile, including optional avatar upload.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Clickable artwork card displaying image, title, artist, and price with lightbox image preview support.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryF: Provides category and sort dropdowns for the gallery, emitting changes via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Displays an artwork image with URL validation, load error handling, and optional click support.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Full-screen dialog lightbox for viewing an artwork image with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Modal form for submitting a purchase inquiry, handling validation, submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying site credits and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links, auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and full‑height layout structure.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Displays a confirmation card after artwork submission with status and navigation actions.
Form for submitting artwork with image upload, draft saving, validation, and profile checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and manage artwork submissions and purchase inquiries, including approve/reject mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Hooks for fetching artist profiles, getting an artist by ID or caller, and creating new artist profiles with query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Hooks to fetch all artworks or a specific artwork by ID via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles user profile fetching/saving and admin authorization checks based on the caller identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to delete an artwork and invalidate related artwork and submission queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to edit artwork details and refresh related artwork and submission caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity loading, and an auth provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches submissions belonging to the logged‑in caller, enabled only when identity and actor are available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Mutation hook to create purchase inquiries and refresh inquiry-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to submit new artwork and invalidate artwork and submission lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and gallery-specific styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page with tabbed views for managing submissions and purchase inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays artist details and lists artworks by the artist, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Displays a list of artists with loading and empty states, showing cards linking to artist profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed artwork info with image lightbox, purchase inquiry, and owner-only delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Provides an artwork edit form with authentication and ownership checks, handling load and error states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays the artwork gallery with filtering, sorting, and loading states using ArtworkCard components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections linking to gallery and submission pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: User profile editor with avatar upload, form validation, and save handling requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Page for submitting new artwork, showing a confirmation after successful submission and clearing drafts.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting GBP monetary values.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Provides functions to validate image URLs and generate user-friendly error messages for invalid or failed image loads.
frontend/src/utils/submitArtworkDraft.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing artwork submission drafts in sessionStorage with basic structure validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, including features, requests, known issues, and architectural notes.
